name: The Obsidian Isles
description: A volcanic archipelago, the Obsidian Isles are known for their treacherous landscapes and the hardy folk who eke out a living in the shadow of active volcanoes. The city of Pyrestone stands as a testament to their resilience.

locations.name: Pyrestone
locations.description: A walled city built into the caldera of a dormant volcano on the largest island. Known for its obsidian mining and fiery forges.

locations.name: Ashfall Village
locations.description: A small, hardy village constantly dusted with volcanic ash, dependent on fishing and hardy crops.

locations.name: Whispering Caves
locations.description: A network of lava tubes rumored to be haunted by the spirits of ancient fire mages.

locations.name: Obsidian Peak
locations.description: The highest peak on the main island, a dormant volcano with a panoramic view of the archipelago.

locations.name: Sulfur Springs
locations.description: Geothermal hot springs rich in sulfur, said to have healing properties, but reeking of brimstone.

locations.name: Jagged Coast
locations.description: A treacherous coastline with sharp rocks and strong currents, the main landing point for ships.

locations.name: Magmaflow Isle
locations.description: The smallest of the three islands, constantly reshaped by active lava flows.

locations.name: Dragon's Breath Vent
locations.description: An active volcanic vent on Magmaflow Isle, emitting noxious fumes and scorching heat.

locations.name: Scorched Lands
locations.description: Barren lands, almost devoid of life due to volcanic activity and toxic gases.

locations.name: Basalt Cliffs
locations.description: Towering cliffs of black basalt, facing the sea. A dangerous place to travel.

visual_prompt: Fantasy parchment map of three volcanic islands. One island features a walled city inside a caldera. The islands are rugged, with visible volcanoes (one active), lava flows, black sand beaches, and jagged cliffs. Use a warm, aged color palette. Include subtle compass rose and minimal ornamental details. No legible text.
original_prompt: Three volcanic islands with a walled city
